overview:
DailyDAC serves as: DEAL ACQUISITION CENTRAL AND DEAL MAKER’S ANALYSIS AND COMMENTARY

What we do: DailyDAC is a subscription-based deal aggregator focused on lower middle market, time sensitive situations. DailyDAC provides subscribers with opportunities to purchase or provide capital to non-public companies and/or their assets.

DailyDAC’s Interactive Deal Database is where our deal flow is housed. Through a premium membership, our investors are able to see over 100+ active lower and middle market deal opportunities at any given time. Premium membership is granted by visiting www.dailydac.com

DailyDAC also offers a free version of our deal flow. Through a weekly E-Newsletter, DailyDAC provides a non-actionable version of our deal flow giving readers a flavor for the deals housed on our Interactive Deal Database. For access to this free version of deal flow, go to www.dailydac.com to be added to the distribution list.
Selling a company or select assets? List it with DailyDAC. DailyDACprovides the opportunity for professionals to list their sell-side engagements on our Interactive Deal Database AND our E-Newsletter, for FREE. DailyDACdoes not charge a commission or finder’s fee for deals closed from DailyDAC. Our members are active investors subscribing to see deal flow.

DailyDAC also provides Deal Maker’s Analysis of Commentary. Located on our website you will find DailyDAC’s suggested websites, blogs, books and DailyDAC Authored Content and Material about various topics including: Family Office, Venture Capital Investing, Private Equity, Estate Planning & Asset Protection Strategices, Distressed Investing, Education for the Entrepreneur, M&A 101, Bankruptcy 101, Finance and Accounting and Selling a Business?

DailyDAC also engages in Strategic Auction Firm Partnerships andDistressed Commerical Real Estate Partnerships. Other advertising opportunities are also available. For more information please contact info@dailydac.com
